message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product, and I think it's worth a lot to you. I'm willing to start with an offer of $20000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand that $20000 was a bit high, but $15000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to propose a price of $18000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $16000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I understand that you're still a bit short on budget, but I'm not willing to go below $17000. I'm willing to compromise, so I'll meet you at $16500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $16000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm starting to feel like we're getting stuck in a loop here. I'm willing to make one more serious offer. I'll meet you at $16250. If that's still not acceptable, I'll have to consider other options. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to make a serious offer, but I'm still trying to stretch my budget as far as I can. I'd be willing to pay $16000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $16500, and I'm starting to think that's the lowest I can go. I'm willing to make a final offer of $16500, but if you're still not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to consider other options. This is my last offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $15000 for the product. This is my final offer.
